ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast, cubed
1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Chicken Soup

cookingTips: Cut chicken into even-sized cubes to ensure uniform cooking
Cook chicken until just cooked through, about 6-7 minutes per side, to avoid drying it out
Stir pesto in off heat to preserve its fresh flavor and vibrant green color
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user create a quick, comforting pasta dish with bright pesto flavor. Guide them on cooking chicken properly and combining ingredients without curdling the sauce.
